synopsis.text: Faced with the imminent closure of Time Photo Studio, Cheng Xiaoshi and Lu Guang, both possessing unique superpowers, team up to fulfill customer commissions by entering their photos. In a bustling city, the duo navigates through the dangers that come with each job, determined to save their small photography shop. However, their mission takes a dark turn when a mysterious killer begins to wreak havoc, putting Lu Guang's life in peril and ensnaring Qiao Ling in a sinister plot. As Cheng Xiaoshi finds himself arrested for a crime he didn't commit, he must learn from past mistakes and act quickly to unravel the deadly conspiracy before it's too late. With only a single clue left behind, can Cheng Xiaoshi and Lu Guang's team unmask the elusive enemy and put an end to the devastating chain of events?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
